section.title: Handling Analysis Projects
section.para: The handling of Analysis Projects is best done in the Analysis Perspective.

section.title: Adding a new Analysis Project
section.para: In the Analysis Perspective the view Analysis Projects is presented. In this view new Analysis Projects can be added.
The button Add... in Analysis Projects view opens the New Analysis dialog. Here the appropriate settings can be made.

listitem.para: The project name is used in Purifinity as project label. Any name can be put here to identify the software which is analyzed.
The Source Directory is the directory where the sources of the project can be found. The analysis which is started later will search this directory recursively.
Description is any text which might describe the project. This description is optional.

section.para: Use Finish to finalize the creation of the new Analysis Project. A new analysis of the new project is triggered immeditially.

section.title: Deleting Analysis Projects
section.para: To delete an Analysis Project, the project needs to be selected in Analysis Projects View. With button Delete... and a verification of the choice, the analysis project is deleted.

section.title: Editing Analysis Projects
section.para: To edit an Analysis Project, the project needs to be selected in Analysis Projects View. With button Edit... the Analyis Project Edit dialog is opened.
